ORCNOG_CARD_VIEWER.settings.enableCardIc: Enable/disable clickable card icons in Sidebar Card Stacks
ORCNOG_CARD_VIEWER.settings.enableDispla: Enable/disable displaying cards when they are dealt.
ORCNOG_CARD_VIEWER.settings.enableWhispe: Enable whisper card details to DM
Enable/disable whispering card details to the DM on view.
ORCNOG_CARD_VIEWER.settings.defaultCardB: Configure the default border width on displayed cards.
